caption.title: Mean (and standard deviation of) z-scores from posterior predictive tests of per-site amino acid diversity and among-lineage compositional homogeneity, called for amino-acid alignments using the PhyloBayes-MPI v1.8 readpb_mpi –div and –comp options, respectively, with burn-ins selected as per the posterior consensus summaries shown elsewhere.
caption.p: Except for the diversity statistic in the test-passing matrix, all tests reject (at p=0.05) the adequacy of the inferred CAT + GTR + Г4 model to describe the data.
